289.movie_plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

21.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

180.movie_plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

134.movie_plot: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

108.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

124.movie_plot: A series of crafted statements inspired by political commentaries at democraticunderground.com during July and August 2011.

146.movie_plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

54.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

281.movie_plot: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

101.movie_plot: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

159.movie_plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

32.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

205.movie_plot: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

182.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

267.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

320.movie_plot: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

310.movie_plot: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

271.movie_plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

244.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

89.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
89.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

260.movie_plot: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

218.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
218.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

242.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

71.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

315.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

240.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

116.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

188.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

166.movie_plot: After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.

272.movie_plot: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.
